DOC.detailed_description: Aim : To improve risk model use underpin national clinical audit adult general critical care , cardiothoracic critical care in-hospital cardiac arrest use data linkage routinely collect data source . Specific objective : 1 . To improve risk model adult general critical care : ( 1a ) develop risk model mortality fix time-points time-to event outcome ( data linkage CMP death registration ONS ) ; develop risk model long term chronic health outcome ( 1b ) diabetes ( data linkage CMP National Diabetes Audit ) ( 1c ) end-stage renal disease ( data linkage CMP UK Renal Registry ) ; ( 1d ) develop risk model subsequent health care utilisation cost ( data linkage CMP HES ) 2 . To improve risk model cardiothoracic critical care : ( 2a ) enhance risk factor data ( data linkage National Adult Cardiac Surgery Database ) ; ( 2b ) develop risk model long term mortality ( data linkage CMP death registration ONS ) ; ( 2c ) develop risk model subsequent health care utilisation cost ( data linkage CMP HES ) 3 . .To improve risk model in-hospital cardiac arrest : ( 3a ) enhance risk factor data ( data linkage NCAA HES ) ; ( 3b ) develop risk model long term mortality , health care utilisation cost ( data linkage NCAA ONS ) ; ( 3c ) develop risk model subsequent critical care utilisation ( data linkage NCAA CMP ) ; ( 3d ) develop risk model subsequent health care utilisation cost ( data linkage NCAA , ONS HES ) 4 .
